level.heading: DOME LIGHT INSTALLATION BUSINESS – PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS (§ 31-1531)

level.text: The schedule below lists penalties for violations of requirements of specified sections of this chapter.
1505 Failure to pay bi-annual license fee $500 / Suspension
1509 Change in fee schedule without notification $500
or repair of dome light outside of
1512 Failure to comply with signage requirements $250
Acceptance of bribe $25,000 and business license
1529 Sale of unapproved dome light for
1530 Failure to keep appropriate records $100 per record

The civil fines set forth in this section shall be doubled for the second (2nd) violation of the same infraction, and shall be doubled once more for any subsequent violation or violations of the same infraction.
The Office of Administrative Hearings shall conduct hearings for violations of infractions delineated in Chapter 15.

In addition to the civil fine, failure to pay the fine or request a hearing within fifteen (15) calendar days of the issuance of a notice of infraction may result in the imposition of a penalty equal to the amount of the civil fine.
Failure to appear for a requested hearing may result in the imposition of a penalty equal to twice the amount of the civil fine.
